nodes.text: Losh was a male Jenet who lived on the planet Coruscant.

In 19 BBY, Losh worked as a civil servant in Emperor Palpatine's new Empire. Captain Typho—former bodyguard of Senator Padmé Amidala of Naboo—sought Losh's help in finding out how the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker died. Losh and Typho first traded insults as was proper in Jenet society before Losh decided to aid Typho. Despite the danger he was placing himself in, Losh allowed Typho to view a list of known Jedi and the manner of their deaths.
